swade-sundries.settings.reminders.enable: Show reminders in the roll dialog.
swade-sundries.settings.reminders.maxlen: The maximum number of characters before reminder text is cut off on the roll dialog.
Adds a sort button to the top of the inventory tab.
swade-sundries.settings.invsec.enabled.h: If enabled, items can be assigned custom sections for player inventories.
swade-sundries.settings.invsec.enabledcl: If enabled, items can be assigned custom inventory sections on this client.
swade-sundries.inventory.section.label: Section
